action.action-desc: Ms. Velázquez (for herself and Mr. Graves of Louisiana) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To adjust collateral requirements under the Small Business Act for disaster loans, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Collateral Requirements for Disaster Loans Act.

section.header: Collateral requirements for disaster loans under the small business act

subsection.header: Amendment to the rise after disaster act of 2015
subsection.text: Section 2102 of the RISE After Disaster Act of 2015 (Public Law 114–88) is amended—
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall take effect as though enacted as part of the RISE After Disaster Act of 2015.
